transport.question: I have wheels and take you places, sometimes with lots of other faces! What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I often have a number on the front.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Many people can ride on me.
🛑 I stop at designated points.

transport.question: I float on water, big or small, taking people across the water, that's my call! What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓️ I might have a horn that goes 'toot toot'.
🛳️ I can be very big and carry cars!

transport.question: I go on tracks, choo choo is my sound. I carry many people all around! What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I need a special path to travel on.
💺 I have many seats for passengers.
🛤️ I follow a line of metal.

transport.question: I fly in the sky, so high above, with wings and an engine, showing people love (of travel)! What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I go very high in the air.
✈️ I take people on long trips.
🛬 I land at an airport.

transport.question: I have two wheels and pedals to push. I can get you around with just a hush! What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 I am good exercise.
🔔 You might ring a bell on me.
🛣️ I can be ridden on a bike path.

transport.question: I carry heavy things, a load I haul, from place to place, I answer the call! What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I often carry things in boxes.
🚧 I am very big.
🚚 I have many wheels.

transport.question: I fly without wings and spin my blades 'round, lifting people straight up from the ground! What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🚨 I am often used in rescue missions.
⏫ My blades spin very fast.

transport.question: I zoom through space to distant stars. I help astronauts go very far! What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 I carry people into space.
🚀 I am very powerful and fast.
✨ I travel beyond our planet.

transport.question: I travel underwater, diving deep. Exploring the ocean's secrets, I keep! What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I cannot be seen on the surface of the water
🔎 I can be used for exploring the deep sea
💛 Sometimes they are painted yellow

transport.question: I have a motor, and two wheels, I am smaller than a car. What am I?

hints.text: 🛣️ I can go on the highway
💨 I am very fast
🪖 You should wear a helmet when you use me

plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear green, but have no clothes. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I grow in the ground.
☀️ I need sun and water.
🌳 I can be big or small.

plant.question: I am yellow and grow tall. Farmers love me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 People and animals like to eat me.
🚜 I grow in a field.
🍿 I can be popped!

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a vine. You can eat me in a salad.

hints.text: 🔴 Some are small and some are big.
🥪 People often put me on sandwiches.
🍅 I am a fruit, even though you might think I'm a vegetable.

plant.question: I have a trunk, branches, and leaves, and birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am a flower that follows the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I am very tall, sometimes even taller than you!
💛 I am usually yellow.
🫘 My seeds can be eaten.

plant.question: I grow underground and can be orange, white, or purple. Rabbits love to eat me.

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
💪 Eating me can help you see in the dark!
🥗 I am often eaten raw or cooked.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful, fragrant flowers. People give me as a gift to show they care.

hints.text: 🌹 I come in many different colors.
🥀 You have to be careful of my sharp thorns.
💐 I am often put in vases.

plant.question: I am tall and green and have needles instead of leaves. Many people decorate me for Christmas.

hints.text: 🌲 I am an evergreen.
🎁 People put presents under me.
⭐ I often have a star on top.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to bury me for later.

hints.text: 🌰 I am a type of nut.
🍂 I fall from trees in autumn.
🐿️ I am a favorite food for squirrels.

plant.question: I am a juicy fruit with a spiky crown. I grow in warm places.

hints.text: 🍍 I have a tough, scaly skin.
🍹 I am a popular flavor in tropical drinks.
💛 My flesh is yellow and sweet.
